synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involves weighing and mixing Li2S, P2S5, and LiCl in specific molar ratios, milling the mixture on a planetary mill, forming pellets, heat treating at 550 degrees under vacuum to synthesize Li6PS5Cl, followed by mixing Li6PS5Cl and TiO2, compressing the mixture into pellets using a hydraulic press to prepare a solid electrolyte.
